author: AiTechEye
long_description:
The tool is a weapon at same time
Throw it and it will always return as long there still is velocity/power left
It can pick up stuff that is breakable by hand (like no use by tools) and mobs/drops that have 10hp or less.
Players (or mobs that have more then 10 hp) will be damaged.

+ Mese can break more stuff, more times at same throw, and can break stuff like stone / ores, makes a flash when hit something

- Wood cant pick up stuff, less damage, fails if it hit something else then air & leaves.
name: chakram
short_description: Chakram: weapon & tool at same time
title: Chakram
